attributes.action: Labour MP's to rediscover their backbone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Can you seriously imagine that a new rebranded Gordon Brown is really going to see off the Tories at the next election. I am a lifelong Labour supporter but this government must be the only ones that cannot see a hammering coming next year. It pains me to say that this lot are are both spineless and remind me of rabbits caught in the headlights not knowing what way to turn. They are also inept when you see the things they have done. Surely they must have realised they had no chance of beating Joanna Lumley on the Ghurka shambles. David Cameron makes Brown look slow, old and grey. again this hurts me to have to say it but its true.
